admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Project would comprise: (i) a
            geological/geophysical reassessment of past exploration data
            with the objective of preparing reports designed to generate
            interest in PNG's prospects by the oil industry; (ii)
            strengthening of the Geological Survey Division of the
            Department of Minerals and Energy by the provision of
            technical assistance, the acquisition of essential office
            facilities where all past exploration data would be
            assembled, and the training of PNG nationals; (iii) a
            promotional effort aimed at inducing oil companies to seek
            exploration licenses in PNG; (iv) a prefeasibility study of
            the development of a small gas-condensate field in PNG and
            re-evaluation of the gas reserves from five earlier
            discoveries; and (v) other studies, the scope of which
            remains to be determined.
